Text.Page:
East of here, the spirits are vicious and aggressive. The {@LinkCreature:28#1041#corrupted mycanars} and {@LinkCreature:28#1031#tumbling sporewalkers} used to watch over these woods.

The corruption drove them mad and now they kill anything they think is intruding. You'd have our gratitude if you could cull their ranks.

My people aren't cowards, but they're not soldiers either.

Your service aids us all. Thank you.
